sourcesContent:
import * as Yup from "yup";
export const toppingsFormSchema = Yup.object().shape({
  pepperoni: Yup.string().required("test"),
  sausage: string(),
  canadianBacon: string(),
  spicyItalianSausage: string(),
  grilledChicken: string(),
  onions: string(),
  greenPepper: string(),
  dicedTomatos: string(),
  blackOlives: string(),
  roastedGarlic: string(),
  artichokeHearts: string(),
  threeCheese: string(),
  pineapple: string(),
  extraCheese: string(),
});
